message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.AI. 

This paper deals with the allocation of services in a mobile Fog infrastructure, which is a combination of cloud and edge computing. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also discusses the optimization of service allocation, which falls under the category of cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper also deals with the uncertainty of resource availability, which can be modeled using probabilistic methods, falling under the category of cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also introduces an integer optimization formulation, which falls under the category of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the paper discusses the modeling of cost and the optimization of service execution, which can be achieved using artificial intelligence techniques, falling under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
